name: Sarah Guermond
body:
##Hello.
I'm a web developer, educator, and inquisitive person.

I graduated in 2012 from the University of Texas at Austin with a BS in Biology, followed by two years of graduate coursework and research at Oregon State University. I work for [General Assembly](generalassemb.ly) helping transform thinkers into creators, and with [Geek Girls Carrots](geekgirlscarrots.org) building a community of women in tech.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
